description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5fjke","text":"This protocol describes the Intracellular Staining (ICS) Senescence Flow Cytometry Panel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97s4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"52cjh","text":"FBS (hiFBS): Gemini Bio Products Cat #100-106 1L","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bdcj","text":"Prepare FBS Aliquots:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6jff","text":"Thaw heat-inactivated FBS (hiFBS):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vsu4","text":"Thaw a 500mL Bottle of FBS at 4°C. This may require more than overnight so the 500mL Bottle may be removed 2 or 3 days prior to use. Do not leave the FBS at room temperature overnight.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dhr4e","text":"Aliquot the 500mL FBS Bottle in 50mL aliquots (a total of ten 50mL hi-FBS Aliquots)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a4bvh","text":"Label the aliquots with Batch#, Expiration Date, Aliquot Date","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2cj4t","text":"Store 50mL aliquots @ -20ºC until expiration date or for up to 2 freeze/thaw cycles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8b6a6","text":"FACS Wash w/ EDTA (D-PBS with 0.5% FBS + 2 mM EDTA): Invitrogen Cat # 41190-250","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":53}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"25m87","text":"Remove 4.5mL PBS from a 500mL bottle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6b3hl","text":"Add 2.5mL of thawed FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ap8kn","text":"Add 2mL of 0.5M EDTA solution (Catalog #: E7889-100ML)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5oa","text":"Label the bottle with preparer's initials and expiration date (one month from preparation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"737fs","text":"Store @ 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c52q2","text":"Pen-Strep-Glut (PSG) (L-Glutamine-Penicillin-Streptomycin Soln): Sigma Cat#: G6784-100ML","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":65}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"17j9k","text":"Thaw 100mL bottle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"97a75","text":"Aliquot into 10mL into 15mL conicals (total of ten 15mL conicals)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"11c6r","text":"Label the aliquots with Batch#, Expiration Date, Aliquot Date","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a3n5","text":" Store @ -20°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dk2t6","text":"R10FBS Media Preparation (“R10”)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4el89","text":"Remove 55mL RPMI from a 500mL bottle of RPMI","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8lnea","text":"Add 50mL aliquot of thawed, hiFBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"46gjd","text":"Add 5mL aliquot of thawed Pen-Strep-Glut","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"moen","text":"Label the bottle with preparer's initials and expiration date (one month from preparation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eej06","text":"Cytofix/Cytoperm Solution (10X) with GolgiStop (monensin): BD Biosciences Cat # 554715","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":59}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7qhh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dftp","text":"Kit Contents :             ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cap5","text":"125mL 10X Perm/Wash Buffer ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fpur","text":"100mL Cytofix Solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2932p","text":"0.7mL GolgiStop (monensin)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i02l","text":"\nTo prepare 1X Perm Wash:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66uhd","text":"1. Dilute 10X BD Perm/Wash buffer in distilled H2O to make a 1X solution prior to use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae39","text":"1% Formaldehyde Solution (“1% Fix”) (“PFA”)\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"426oq","text":"Reagents:    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bj425","text":"10% Formalin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s7ek","text":"PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"91qob","text":"Add 5 mL 10% Formalin to a sterile 50 mL centrifuge conical tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9kr0a","text":"Add 45 mL PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ahg4g","text":"Label the bottle with reagent name, initials \u0026 expiration date (one month from preparation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5nkpj","text":"Store 1% Fix at Room Temperature (18-25°C) for up 1 month\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6al2v","text":"PepMixes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emmuh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lfbs","text":"PepMix CEFX Ultra SuperStim Pool MHC-II Subset, JPT Technologies Cat #:PM-CEFX-3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0d1c","text":"PepMix CEF Pool (extended), JPT Technologies Cat #: PM-CEF-E-1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"59qs3","text":"Aliquot and store at -20°C until day of use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brtr7","text":"On day of use, use 0.45uL per test","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adee5","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45ihi","text":"Overview","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcjja","text":"\nDay 1: Thaw cells and distribute to 2 plates. Rest plates at 37C/5% CO2 for \u003e6 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":1,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a41ia","text":"Overnight: Stim for 6 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsfav","text":"Day 2: 1 Stim + 1 Unstim plate stain for surface and ICS then acquire flow data","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a57m","text":"Time experiment steps according to lab and anticipated acquisition schedule","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7iss2","text":"Day 1 – Thawing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drccq","text":"1.  Prepare 20ml of R10 in 50mL conical tube per sample (1-4 vials per tube)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b0gi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mg1m","text":"2. Warm the R10 for 30 min at 37C prior to use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6226r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br5vo","text":"3. Place cryovials in a 37C bath for 3-5 sec at a time. Withdraw, examine and repeat (usually 3-4 rounds) until small, pea-sized amount of ice remains","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8h2de","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ccg","text":"4. Spray with 70% EtOH and wipe off before returning to the hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dom3g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9986","text":"5. To each cryovial, add 1ml of R10 dropwise to each cryovial","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m3dc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6doan","text":"6. Transfer the 2ml PBMC sample from the cryovials into the 50ml conicals","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a184d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bghg2","text":"7.  Invert 3x to mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5om5m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rro5","text":"8. Centrifuge at 350g for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o3l8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2oc1a","text":"9. Pour off the supernatant, do not shake to allow some volume to remain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"476su","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aupbd","text":"10. Gently swirl the 50mL conical in remaining volume to loosen pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d33ae","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6smbu","text":"11. Add 10mL pre-warmed R10 and resuspend by pipetting 10 times. Mix sample carefully but\nthoroughly to break up any cell clumps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a903","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9a87r","text":"12. Centrifuge at 350g for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c5gr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ar95","text":"13. Pour off the supernatant, do not shake to allow some volume to remain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f3is","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"t9fo","text":"14. Gently swirl the 50mL conical in remaining volume to loosen pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t94k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7p88j","text":"15. Add 10mL pre-warmed R10 and resuspend by pipetting 10 times. Mix sample carefully but\nthoroughly to break up any cell clumps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jvd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5gnr","text":"16.    COUNTING \u0026 VIABILITY:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"342pa","text":"a)      Perform a cell count using the Countess II to determine PBMC viability \u0026 recovery","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mbi8","text":"b)      Add 10uL Trypan Blue to well of mixing plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h7vv","text":"c)      Add 10uL Cells, pipette up and down","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbonp","text":"d)      Remove 10uL of cell mix and dispense into Countess slide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alpj9","text":"e)      Wait 30 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56q3i","text":"f)       Calculate total cells and viability","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmash","text":"g)      Insert into Countess II to calculate total cells and viability","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9825p","text":"Overnight – Stim","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43guv","text":"Cells have been plated at 2x106 cells/well in 200uL R10 and rested for >6hours","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":30,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fo03b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3muc0","text":"2. For all wells (Stim and Unstim), add BFA/Monensin at ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqena","text":"a. BFA: 0.23 uL per test","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkvtl","text":"b. Monensin: 0.16 uL per test","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"898ca","text":"c. CD107a antibody: 0.313uL per test","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d09j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr9do","text":"3. For Stim plates, add CEF PepMix at","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nlhs","text":"a. PepMix CEFX Ultra SuperStim Pool MHC-II Subset: 0.45uL per test","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o3q9","text":"b. PepMix CEF Pool (extended) : 0.45uL per test","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clu5","text":" 4. Gently plate by vortexing at medium speed for 3 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uiju","text":" 5. Incubate cells at 37º C, 5% CO2 for 6 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bf40","text":" 6. At 6 hours (9am), wrap plate in Parafilm and place in 4C refrigerator and proceed with staining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bojtp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nviu","text":" Stim Mixes # Tubes: 16 16 uL per test Stim UnStim BFA 0.23 4.232 4.232 Monensin 0.16 2.944 2.944 CEFX ultra MHC II 0.45 8.28 - {"blocks":[{"key":"24j4v","text":"Day 2 – Stain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddn1s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32rm3","text":"Keep everything as cold as much as possible","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drbrs","text":"Keep everything covered as much as possible; work in dark or incandescent light","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12ao","text":"

Surface staining:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":2,"length":17},{"style":"italic","offset":2,"length":17},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":2,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ne89","text":"
1. Remove plates from refrigerator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4irt4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77uiq","text":"2. Centrifuge 400g x 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"h2gj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctrnv","text":"3. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3ed0","text":"     
4. Add 47.5uL FACS wash to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5mqk","text":"
5. Add 2.5uL TruStain FCX blocking to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2im1v","text":"
6. Incubate 4C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4mgo","text":"
7. Prepare Surface Stain Mix in PBS with 10uL BSB Plus, set aside","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9gg1","text":"
8. Add 50uL of Surface Stain Mix in PBS to each well and gently mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am9nm","text":"     
9. Incubate in 4C fridge for 30 min, covered in foil","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":35,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e2b5","text":" 
10. Add 100uL cold FACS wash & mix by pipetting up and down x3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fb5t","text":"
11. Centrifuge 400g x 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnna2","text":"
12. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfeg4","text":"
13. Add 200uL cold FACS wash to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j0mi","text":" 
14. Centrifuge 400g x 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kful","text":" 
15. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"skch","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1r6k","text":"Intracellular cytokine staining (ICS): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":38},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db3ir","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4k","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5fkds","text":"
16. Add 100uL BD Cytofix/Cytoperm solution to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbnrv","text":"a.     NOTE: mix well with cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a52ko","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5qev","text":"17. Incubate on ice for 20 min, covered in foil","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"872ae","text":"a.     NOTE: do not over-incubate (Cytofix is toxic to cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":10},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":13,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ej7h","text":"    
18. Prepare ICS Stain Mix in 1X Perm Wash with 10uL BSB Plus, set aside","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5ts1","text":"    
19. Add 100uL cold 1X Perm Wash solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1eemv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ndps","text":"20. Centrifuge 400g x 3 min ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sg61","text":"     
21. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gk0b","text":"    
22. Add 200uL cold 1X Perm Wash solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nt0u","text":"
23. Centrifuge 400g x 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9st77","text":"     
24. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"213is","text":"    
25. Add 50uL of the ICS Mix in Perm Wash to each well and gently mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9il23","text":" 
26. Incubate at 4° in refrigerator x 30 min, covered in foil","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4mv0","text":"   
27. Add 150uL cold 1X Perm Wash solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d7le","text":" 
28. Centrifuge 400g x 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0a1s","text":"
29. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o435","text":"  
30. Add 200uL cold 1X Perm Wash solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"esclf","text":"  
31. Centrifuge 400g x 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5geq3","text":"
32. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aevr","text":"
33. Add 200uL cold 1X Perm Wash solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brkg9","text":"
34. Centrifuge 400g x 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9t3v","text":"
35. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"248fi","text":"
36. Add 200uL 1% PFA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9asmv","text":"
37. Transfer samples to bullet tubes, cover with aluminum foil, store at 4°C, & acquire within 6 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1ohb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ck1hp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mnp0","text":"
